education.certificate_name: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering

responsibilities: Working as a team lead on a SaaS product building new features for a US startup with Node, PHP, React, and WordPress.
Made their applications auto-scalable including their WordPress website utilizing AWS services like EFS, S3, Aurora, and Lambda.
Working on improving the overall architecture by migrating to new technologies like Nextjs, and improving the deployment cycle with seamless CI/CD.
Maintained a legacy Windows Form application while simultaneously migrating it to ASP.NET Web APIs and Angular.
Creating a new auth flow for their new web application using certificates, Azure AD, and a custom database-backed authentication scheme improving the over security and flexibility of the system.
I worked on migrating their internal legacy management software from ASP.NET Framework to the latest ASP.NET Core using their proprietary architecture based on clean architecture.

Optimized slow-performing EF queries to SQL procedure boosting the performance of complex workflows by bringing down execution time from 60+ minutes to 4 seconds. This improved the organization's efficiency in processing reimbursements and salaries for the growing workforce.
Improved the performance of low-performing APIs using caching. This improved the performance of APIs, reducing the response time from a couple of seconds to sub 100ms.
Implemented Classic CI/CD on Azure DevOps from scratch using self-host agents.
